string.text: Grants Extra Arrows.

You lead the charge and you are unphased by enemy ranged weapons.{newline} {newline}Grants Kontos{newline} {newline}-10% Damage taken from Ranged Weapons{newline}-10% Damage taken by Mount from Ranged Weapons
Longer Sword
You know how to handle yourself in melee, you take less damage from cutting attacks.{newline} {newline}Grants Small Shield{newline} {newline}-10% Damage taken from Cutting Attacks

You are an expert at protecting yourself and your mount.{newline} {newline}Grants Stronger Shield{newline} {newline}-20% Damage taken from Ranged Weapons {newline}-20% Damage taken by Mount from Ranged Weapons
Heavier Crossbow

Getting hurt puts you in a frenzied rage, you take less damage and deal more damage in melee the more you get hurt.{newline} {newline}+5% Damage per 20 Hitpoints lost{newline}-5% Damage Taken from Melee Attacks per 20 Hitpoints lost

You are a seasoned fighter, experienced in all disciplines of combat.{newline} {newline}Grants Sword{newline} {newline}+20% Damage Dealt to Shields {newline}+4 Armor {newline}+10% Damage Dealt with Melee Weapons
Faster Release
Replaces Voulge with Two Handed Sword, effective at dueling and thrusting, two handed.

You are an expert at fighting against cavalry on foot and mastered to use cavalry's speed against itself.{newline} {newline}Grants Long Spear.{newline} {newline}+100% Damage to Mounts with Melee Weapons{newline}+100% Speed Bonus Damage with Melee Weapons on Piercing Attacks
Replaces mount with a more maneuverable horse.
Replaces mount with a faster and more maneuverable horse.

You are able throw axes much quicker with greater precision, throwing axes also deal extra damage to shields.{newline} {newline} Grants Throwing Axes{newline} {newline}+50% Initial Ranged Accuracy{newline}+50% Faster Ranged Accuracy Increase{newline}-10% Damage taken from Ranged Weapons
Replaces mount with a faster and more maneuverable horse.
Your experience as a Pikeman allows you to use the Pike more effectively, thrusting faster.{newline} {newline}Grants Pike{newline} {newline}+20% Thrust Speed
You know the weak points of shields, your attacks are extra effective against shields.{newline} {newline}+20% Damage to Shields{newline}-10% Damage Taken from Melee Attacks
Your time spent in nature made you unnaturally strong, you can throw much further.{newline} {newline}Grants Pilum{newline} {newline}+20% Throwing Speed{newline}-10% Damage taken from Ranged Weapons
Replaces mount with a more maneuverable, durable but slower horse that deals more charge damage.
Replaces Sickle with Hammer, effective against armored opponents.
Replaces Lance with Longer Lance.
Getting hurt puts you in a frenzied rage, you deal more damage in melee the more you get hurt.{newline} {newline}Grants Axe{newline} {newline}+5% Damage per 20 Hitpoints lost
Generous Lord
Faster Horse
Replaces Gladius with Pugio, much faster but shorter and deals less damage.
Replaces Menavlion with Heavy Menavlion, longer but slower.{newline} {newline}Can Crush Through on Overhead swings.
Replaces Long Sword with Noble Sword, longer and deals more damage.
Grants Heavy Lance, more damage than spears, couchable.
Replaces Hunting Bow with Guard's Bow, deals more damage, accurate but slower.
Grants Lance, longer than spears but slower, couchable.

You are able throw javelins much quicker with greater precision.{newline} {newline}Grants additional Javelins{newline} {newline}+50% Initial Ranged Accuracy{newline} +50% Faster Ranged Accuracy Increase{newline}-10% Damage taken from Ranged Weapons
You are well supplied and an expert at spending it well, you reload faster.{newline} {newline}Grants 15 Extra Bolts{newline} {newline}+25% Reload Speed
Pavise Shield
Thick Skin
Replaces Recurve Bow with Composite Bow, deals more damage and accurate but slower.
Your experience as a Warden allows you fight better in melee. You take less cutting damage.{newline} {newline}Grants Polearm{newline} {newline}-10% Damage taken from Cutting Attacks

You have impeccable footwork, you deal more bonus damage depending on speed difference and you able to soften the hits you take.{newline} {newline}+50% Speed Bonus Damageon Foot{newline}-20% Damage Taken from Melee Attacks
Replaces Spear with Longer Spear.
Replaces Flyssa with Kaskara, longer and deals more damage.
Replaces Sword with Heavy Mace, effective against armored opponents.
Big Game Hunter
Two Handed Axe

Your strong arm allows you to throw faster with much more deadly force.{newline} {newline}Grants Stronger Javelins{newline} {newline}+10% Throwing Weapon Damage{newline}+20% Throwing Weapons Speed{newline}-10% Damage taken from Ranged Weapons
Heavy Menavlion
Replaces Recurve Bow with Composite Bow, more accurate, deals more damage but slower.
Sword and Shield
Replaces Tabar with Bardiche, slower but deals more damage.
Getting hurt puts you in a frenzied rage, you deal more damage in melee the more you get hurt.{newline} {newline}+10% Damage per 20 Hitpoints lost
Agile Horse
Replaces Sword with Mace, effective against armored opponents.

You lead the charge and you are unphased by enemy ranged weapons.{newline} {newline}Grants Heavy Kontos{newline} {newline}-35% Damage taken from Ranged Weapons {newline}-35% Damage taken by Mount from Ranged Weapons

Grants +2 additional troops.
Replaces Axe with Bastard Axe, longer, can be used two handed.
Replaces Menavlion with Long Menavlion, longer but slower. Deals more thrust damage and less swing damage.
Shield Breaker
Improved Armor
You are an expert at fighting while moving around with your bow.{newline} {newline}+50% Faster Weapon Switch to Bow{newline}-80% Turning Accuracy Penalty{newline}-80% Moving Accuracy Penalty
Long Spear
You enjoy the battle, you swing your weapons faster and take less damage in melee combat.{newline} {newline}+5% Swing Speed{newline}-20% Damage Taken from Melee Attacks
Replaces Two Handed Axe with Two Handed Maul. Effective against armored opponents, two handed.{newline} {newline}Can Crush Through on Overhead swings.
Provides armor for your mount.{newline} {newline}+22 Armor to Mount
Cavalry Breaker
You are athletic, you run faster and can dodge to reduce the impact of hits you take.{newline} {newline}+5% Maximum Running Speed{newline}-20% Damage Taken from Melee Attacks
You are the reason enemy troops have trouble sleeping, an unstoppable death dealer.{newline} {newline}+9 Armor{newline}+10% Swing Speed on Horseback{newline}+10% Damage dealt with Blunt Weapons
You have impeccable footwork, you deal more bonus damage depending on speed difference.{newline} {newline}+50% Speed Bonus Damage on Foot{newline}+5% Maximum running Speed
Replaces Axe with Sword, effective at dueling and thrusting.
You use the fluid moves of your tribal dancing while fighting allowing you move around your opponents with ease.{newline} {newline}Grants Axe{newline} {newline}+5% Maximum Running Speed

Your Shield has more durability and allow you to cover more area with your shield. You also take less damage from Piercing weapons.{newline} {newline}Grants Stronger Shield{newline} {newline}+20% Shield Area vs Ranged Weapons{newline}-30% Damage taken from Piercing Weapons
Extra Arrows

You are a seasoned fighter, experienced in all disciplines of combat.{newline} {newline}Grants Axe{newline} {newline}+20% Damage Dealt to Shields {newline}+4 Armor {newline}+10% Damage Dealt with Melee Weapons

Replaces Voulge with a Sword and Shield combination. Grants versatility and protection.
Long Sword
Replaces mount with a horse that deals more charge damage.

Replaces Heavy Axe with Noble Axe, deals more damage.

Replaces Sword with Club, effective against armored opponents.
Grants Axe, effective against shields.

Longer Menavlion
Replaces Sword with Glaive, a Khuzait polearm.

Two Handed Maul
Replaces mount with a faster but less durable horse.
Stronger Bow
Grants further travelling projectiles, increasing effective range.
Replaces Hunting Bow with Hunting Longbow, deals more damage but slower.
You know how to earn some extra gold on the side.{newline} {newline}+10 Gold per Kill
Stronger Shield

You are one of the best among your troops, you throw farther and deal more damage.{newline} {newline}Grants Stronger Javelins{newline} {newline}+10% Ranged Damage{newline}+20% Throwing Speed{newline}-10% Damage taken from Ranged Weapons
